Brix yells down to Striker.

"Well, when were ready to attack just hollar. I'm always ready for 
battle!" And than in a mutter he said to himself. "If I can just keep 
the other me under control..."

Brix walks over to what remains of the CR Chambers.

"Well, if what Striker says is true, than were going to be needing 
these very soon."

Brix began investigating how to reapir the CR Chambers.
